title: Calories in Cinnamon Rolls
meta_description: Discover calories in cinnamon rolls, including macros like carbs and sugar, per-roll nutrition facts, and easy tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard medium cinnamon roll (~100 g) with cream cheese icing, baked, no nuts or extra fillings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, brand, size, and toppings. Homemade or commercial versions differ; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One cinnamon roll has about 300 kcal, mostly from carbs and fats.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add chopped nuts (1 tbsp per roll)

faqs.q: How many calories in one cinnamon roll?
faqs.a: Approximately 300 kcal for a standard medium roll with icing.

faqs.q: Are cinnamon rolls high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, about 20 g sugars per roll, mainly from icing and filling.

faqs.q: What's the carb count in cinnamon rolls?
faqs.a: Around 45 g carbs per roll, including 2 g fiber.

faqs.q: Do cinnamon rolls have much protein?
faqs.a: Low, only about 4 g protein per roll.

faqs.q: How does baking method affect calories in cinnamon rolls?
faqs.a: Fried versions add oil and increase calories; baked is lower.
